goals__remit:
The Islamic Community in Bosnia and Herzegovina is the sole and united community and through the institution of The Grand Mufti it has jurisdiction over the entire Bosnia and Herzegovina as well as Croatia, Slovenia, Sanjak, Serbia and Bosnian communities around the globe including all western European countries. Grand Mufti Husein Kavazovic represents The Islamic community. 
 
Some of the main goals of The Islamic community are as following: 
 
- Promoting good and preventing evil. 
 
- Protecting the authenticity of the Islamic ethical norms and assuring their proper interpretation and application. 
 
- Entrusting the leading and imam positions only to those with the adequate education and indispensable approval of the authority of The Grand Mufti. 
 
- Taking care of the Islamic education and upbringing of its members. 
 
- Preserving the values of marriage and family life. 
 
- Coordinating Bosnian communities on national and international level. 
 
- Assuring the religious rights of Muslims and joining efforts strengthening freedom of religion as a fundamental human right. 
 
- Supporting and promoting activities concerning peace, intra- and interreligious dialogue, integration and coexistence. 
 
- Advocating cooperation while rejecting isolation. 
 
- Countering radicalism, extremism and terrorism.
